item.description:
Jointly sponsored by Yale University Press and Yale Repertory Theatre, The Yale Drama Series is an annual competition that supports emerging playwrights. The winner is awarded the David C. Horn Prize of $10,000, publication of his/her manuscript by Yale University Press, and a reading at Yale Rep. The Yale Drama Series is funded by generous support from the David C. Horn Foundation. Pulitzer Prize winner Edward Albee served as the first judge of the series and selected the 2007 and 2008 recipients, and David Hare selected the 2009 and 2010 recipients. John Guare is the current judge.


In NEW LIGHT SHINE, four small-town lives are linked through a violent crime and their attempts to erase the past and build new lives.

Cast includes Alec Beard, Emily Dorsch, and Sarah Sokolovic.

For Mature Audiences.

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: "Winner" of Yale's Drama Series " New Light Shining" FREE Theater Production
